person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Peters left a meeting between NZ First and National negotiators to spend 20 minutes speaking to Labour leader Helen Clark .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |

| NZ First and National negotiators |
| Labour leader Helen Clark |

In this paragraph, the "Person" entities are "Peters", "NZ First and National negotiators", and "Labour leader Helen Clark". I have presented them as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Note that "NZ First and National negotiators" are mentioned together as a group, and "Labour leader" is a title preceding "Helen Clark", but I have included them as separate entities to reflect the exact wording in the original paragraph.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| Peters |
| Helen Clark |

In this paragraph, the "Person" entities are "Peters" and "Helen Clark". I have removed "NZ First and National negotiators" as it is a group of people and not a clear reference to a single person.
